text: Katherine Mansfield Beauchamp Murry (14 October 1888 â€“ 9 January 1923) was a writer. She was born in New Zealand. She moved to the United Kingdom when she was 19. She died when she was 34. ==Early life== Mansfield was born into a middle-class family in Wellington. She was a cousin of Elizabeth von Arnim. She went to Queen's College with her sisters. Category:1888 births Category:1923 deaths Category:New Zealand writers
title: Katherine Mansfield
